Package i5.las2peer.api.security

Interface Agent

All Known Subinterfaces:
AnonymousAgent, GroupAgent, PassphraseAgent, ServiceAgent, UserAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AgentImpl, AnonymousAgentImpl, BotAgent, EthereumAgent, EthereumGroupAgent, GroupAgentImpl, MonitoringAgent, PassphraseAgentImpl, ServiceAgentImpl, TestAgent, UserAgentImpl
public interface Agent
Represents an acting entity in the network. It can have two states: Locked agents cannot used to perform any actions while unlocked agents are able to do so.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getIdentifier()
    The agent id
    boolean
    isLocked()
    Returns whether the agent is locked or not.

      Returns:
